item.title: Retirees: The news from Jackson Hole is ominous for you
item.description: Why the independence of the Federal Reserve is essential to retirees — and everyone else.

item.title: How can I spend $5,000 to $10,000 a year on travel without wrecking my finances?
item.description: Use this formula to budget for your yearly travel.

item.title: I’m single, 75, and living with kidney disease and a pacemaker. I’ve no long-term care insurance. Will I be OK?
item.description: “My income is $120,000 per year which includes $60,000 in Social Security and a pension.”

item.title: In $18 billion deal to buy JDE Peet’s, Keurig Dr Pepper unwinds a 2018 marriage between soda and coffee
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. announced an $18 billion all-cash deal to acquire Dutch-based JDE Peet’s NV on Monday, a major bet on coffee for the U.S. drinks...

item.title: Temu’s parent company is trying to fend off competition from Alibaba — but it’s a costly fight
item.description: PDD is spending more to boost revenue, and its stock is rising as investors seem satisfied with the trade off.
